meanings.definition: A synthetic polypeptide with anti-inflammatory and wound-healing properties.
meanings.english_definition: A synthetic polypeptide with anti-inflammatory and wound-healing properties.

examples.sentence: A combination of AME-3 and alypin was shown to accelerate wound healing in rats.
examples.translation: AME-3とアリピンの組み合わせは、ラットの創傷治癒を促進することが示された。
